roleset.name: (cause to) become worse
roleset.note: WORSEN-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4. Comparison with 'improve'. (from worsen.01-v)
WORSENING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. Comparison to 'worsen.01'. See VN class other_cos-45.4. No Fn class. Framed by Katie. (from worsening.01-n)

role.descr: entity for whom arg1 is getting worse

example.name: worsen-v: agentive but perhaps not grammatical
example.text: John worsened his breath by chewing garlic-flavored gum.

example.name: worsen-v: agentive? Instrumental?
example.text: The buy-out effort also worsened already-strained relations between United's pilot and machinist unions.
example.arg: already-strained relations between United's pilot and machinist unions

example.name: worsen-v: definitely instrumental
example.text: Yesterday, Armstrong reported [flat earnings for the third quarter and nine months]-1, worsened *trace*-1 by the stock dilution of an employee stock ownership plan adopted earlier this year.
example.arg: by the stock dilution of an employee stock ownership plan adopted earlier this year

example.name: worsen-v: ergative
example.text: Gasoline margins may rebound this quarter, some industry officials say, but they believe chemical margins could worsen.

example.name: worsening-n: thing getting worse
example.text: a worsening of symptoms

example.name: worsen-v: With arg 2
example.text: His worsening stomach problems

roleset.name: unskilled at, ineffective
roleset.note: BAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on good.02. (from bad.02-j)
WORSE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from worse.02-j)

example.name: bad-j: Args 1 and 2
example.text: I'm bad at singing.

example.name: bad-j: arg2 subject
example.text: Your English is also not bad

roleset.name: expired, curdled, rancid, gone bad, etc.
roleset.note: BAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on good.03. (from bad.03-j)

example.name: bad-j: the arg
example.text: How long does mayonnaise last? Answers related to sell and use by dates, how to store mayonnaise and how to tell if mayonnaise is bad.

roleset.name: harmful for
roleset.note: BAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on good.04. (from bad.04-j)
WORSE-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from worse.04-j)

example.name: bad-j: both args
example.text: Bug juice is bad for you.

example.name: worse-j: lexicalized comparative: worse
example.text: Independence would be worse for both scotland and the rest of the UK .
example.arg: for both scotland and the rest of the UK

roleset.name: extensive, intense
roleset.note: BAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5; comparative 'worse' found in medi-seedcorpus. (from bad.05-j)

example.name: bad-j: the arg
example.text: I had grade 2 acne and it was particularly bad when I ' overwashed ' so I was compelled to wash less and to start moisturising -LRB- Nivea : Dry Skin , after washing or shaving -RRB- in my late teens .

example.name: bad-j
example.text: Security is not bad

example.name: worse-j: lexical comparative: worse
example.text: Multiple , focal high - grade stenoses are seen throughout the superficial femoral artery , which-1 [*-1] are worse than on the prior examination .

roleset.name: generally negative, morally bad, displeasing
roleset.note: BAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, good.01. (from bad.01-j)
WORSE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from worse.01-j)
WORST-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from worst.01-j)

example.name: bad-j: arg1
example.text: This is not because their race or culture is wrong or bad in any way , it 's simply a fact that certain groups have higher rates of crime .

example.name: bad-j: arg1
example.text: I mentioned yesterday that escalation is bad ? things just keep getting more intense until someone ends up dead.

example.name: bad-j: Da Na Na Na Na
example.text: Bartolome, my grandfather...badass...i've been told he was Bad to the bone.

example.name: bad-j: both args
example.text: I played a lot of Street Fighter as a young man and Zangief tormented me so much that I don't care what anybody says, he was bad to me.

example.name: bad-j: concatenation
example.text: Emotionally he was bad to be around but I don't think he did it on purpose.

example.name: worse-j: lexicalized comparative rel: worse
example.text: But an agressive opposition , along with a biased press and press with an agenda make them-1 out *PRO*-1 to be a lot worse than they are .

roleset.name: in unfortunate circumstances/condition
roleset.note: BAD_OFF-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. Comparison to well.03. (from bad.06-j)
WORSE_OFF-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from worse.06-j)

example.name: bad_off-j: arg1
example.text: From the mirror up the truck is pretty bad off, but not as bad as the other guy.

example.name: worse_off-j: lexical comparative: worse_off, 'the __, the __-er" CXN
example.text: Applied to health care , the longer we wait for it the worse off we are and the longer we put it off the longer it will take to fine tune it .

example.name: worse_off-j: both args
example.text: Similarly, Bob is worse off doing anything differently assuming Alice continues to be uncooperative.
example.arg: assuming Alice continues to be uncooperative
